Create a waterproof version of the Post-it Notes for use in wet environments.
Develop a reusable version of the Post-it Notes that can be used multiple times without losing its stickiness.
Introduce a set of color-coded Post-it Notes to help users organize their tasks and priorities.
Create a Post-it Note dispenser that can be attached to a wall or desk, making it easy to access and use.
Develop a Post-it Note app that allows users to take photos of their physical Post-it Notes and transfer them to a digital format.
